name: trader-ai-performance-testing
description: Real executable performance testing framework for trader-ai CI/CD system

scripts.compile: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run copy-compiled
scripts.copy-compiled: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const p=require('path');const src='dist';const dest='compiled';function copy(s,d){if(!fs.existsSync(d))fs.mkdirSync(d,{recursive:true});fs.readdirSync(s).forEach(f=>{const sp=p.join(s,f);const dp=p.join(d,f);if(fs.statSync(sp).isDirectory())copy(sp,dp);else fs.copyFileSync(sp,dp)});};copy(src,dest);"
scripts.test:all: npm run performance:test && npm run performance:load && npm run performance:integration

author: Performance Testing Framework
